comments.message: Hi Matt, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

description: WHO should put money and research efforts into blood transplants from cured ebola victims to currently infected victims.
summary: The convalescent serum is a great idea for curing this international crisis. WHO should research more on the effectiveness of these blood transplants. It is unethical to start giving treatment to these people without knowing what could happen.
title: WHO should put more research into the convalescent serum.
